trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Bay Shore
There were no other sightings in Bay Shore on or around June 1st 1975
Summary: i remember waving goodbye...i remember being with my sister and parents
divs: Sighting Detailsok here i go .....i remember waving goodbye to a saucer disk like flying thing it had rotating lights around the middle i remember blue red yellow..and i remember being with my sister and my parents...there is hardly a day that goes by when i still dont think about this....but they dont seem to remember this....around the same year or so i remember running out to see if santa came ...and i remember seeing 3 aliens...and i seem to remember them being a brownish in color...like a light brown color....and about the same height i was when i was a kid...three to four feet...but i remember no more after i first see them..then in or around the year 2000....i was living in coram ny...it was around 5 am i was on my way to work (i drove a garbage truck) i lived in a high ranch i walked down the stairs my car was parked in the street...as i was walking to my car inbetween my house and my neighbors house i noticed a orb it had a white flourecesent color around the size of a small beach ball...any way as i looked at for a few seconds it shot straight up and then it twinkled and then looked like the rest of the stars in the sky...and that was it..
